verify_doc_success_description: The document has been verified and signed by the authorized party.
verify_doc_failed_description: The document failed to verify. Please try again later.
verify_doc_qr_code_description: QR Code is invalid. Please try again.
upload_pdf_description: Please upload the PDF document you want to check. This document will not be stored on our server and is only used for verification purposes.
scan_pdf_description: Please scan the QR Code on the PDF document you want to check. This document will not be stored on our server and is only used for verification purposes.
document_verified_description: The document has been verified and signed by the authorized party.
